page.title: 16Methodist Church in Clun
page.content: There are Sunday services at 11.00 and 18.30 and Sunday School is at 11.00. A coffee morning is held on the last Friday of each month. The official annual account which was made in October 1984 shows that the average attendances for the year were 35 adults and 20 children (Sunday School) at morning services and 17 adults at evening service. There are 40 church members on roll, 73 on the church community roll and 30 Sunday School scholars. Total running costs of the church are Â£5000 a year. The money is raised by special events plus a grant. In addition Â£1400 pounds has been raised in 3 years for extension to the Sunday School.The minister, the Reverent Edwin Thompson is semi- retired. He lives in the manse but works part time as a preacher in the Clun chapel.
